There’s nothing quite like a good awards ceremony, and there’s one happening live this evening.
Below should be a live stream of [the Frontline Club Journalism Awards](http://www.fromthefrontline.co.uk/blogs/index.php?blog=5&title=frontline_club_journalism_awards&more=1&c=1&tb=1&pb=1), starting at 7pm on Friday (about the time this is posted)
[Video clips hosted by Ustream](http://www.ustream.tv)
